title: Lemon drizzle loaf cake
ingredients: ['For the cake', '225g (8 oz) margarine', '225g (8 oz) caster or granulated sugar', '225g (8 oz) eggs (see tip)', '225g (8 oz) self raising flour', '1 level teaspoon baking powder', 'zest of 1 lemon', 'For the drizzle', 'juice of 1 lemon', '90g (3 oz) caster sugar']
